Key Match Events: Damian Lillard keyed an 18-6 run that put the Bucks up 88-77 at the end of the third quarter.
The Bucks built out an 18-point lead early into the fourth frame.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Jazz are now 1-7, while the Bucks have improved to a still-bad 2-6.
Others: Giannis Antetokounmpo and Damian Lillard each scored over 30 points.
AJ Green, reserve power forward/center Bobby Portis and guard Pat Connaughton helped the Bucks build out an 18-point lead.
